### Get in touch

* Write an email to `heckmann (dot) mark (at) gmail (dot) com`.
* There is a [shared Dropbox folder for contributors](https://www.dropbox.com/sh/453dhcf2b0i2tq6/AAC09Qkg5jMGl2ZAh2EYi7-Da?dl=0). Have a look at it. If you want to get access to it e.g. to add some stuff, write an email.
* (Expert level): Post a bug, issue or enhancement directly on [github](https://github.com/markheckmann/OpenRepGrid/issues).


### Contributors

* [Mark Heckmann](http://www.markheckmann.de) (University of Bremen, Germany, package maintainer)
* Richard C. Bell (University of Melbourne, Australia, thanks for some FORTRAN code and for the joint work on [bootstrap clustering](slideshare.net/markheckmann/a-new-development-in-the-hierarchical-clustering-of-repertory-grid-data-24444362))
